entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blowing snow at times. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
